page.title: 20CLUBS - STRANRAER
page.content: There are a wide range of clubs in Stranraer, from charitable groups like the Rotary, Round Table and Roteract clubs to social and athletic clubs, e.g. cycling, boxing, running, golfing, angling, riding, operatic and drama clubs, and both amatuer and professional football teams. There are also youth organisations, e.g. 2 Boys' Brigade companies and several Girl Guides units. There are also three working men's clubs in the town. ************** This Domeday block was compiled through the efforts of two Stranraer Primary Schools. { {Primary Four - Park Primary School. { {Primary Seven - St. Joseph's Primary { } {School.
